post.author: 김민
post.content:
Hi Min
I need your help. We are looking for a very Sr. J2EE Consultant type for permanent relocation to NYC. http://www.gurulink.ca/jobview.asp?JobID=206 Maybe you are interested or know someone who is? It requires citizenship and a degree for the TN1 Visa. Can you help?
Brad McIntosh brad@gurulink.ca 416.644.8869 http://www.gurulink.ca
Must Have Skills: ------------------- *** On-Going Requirment *** many hired -3 more to go! *** *** Currently roles in NYC, may be needs in Toronto shortly - 4+ years J2EE/Java Development (EJB, Struts, JDBC, Servlet, Ant, JUnit, JMS, JTA etc. - WebLogic 6.1 or higher (8.1 is best) Guru level ideally - Messaging: JMS, MQ Series, Tibco - Sybase, Oracle, Sybase (Strong RDBMS): Triggers, Stored Procedures, Indexing, Table Design - Linux Shell (RedHat), C Shell, Borne Shell - Experienced with Financial Services or web based applications (Real Time) - Excellent communications/presentation/client facing - University degree in CS (Required for TN Visa) - Willing to travel to the US (25% or more)
post.title: J2EE Role in NYC
